about.title: About Us
about.description1: At QuizPop, we're all about creating meaningful connections through fun and learning. Our mission is to deliver innovative ways to bring people together, spark joy, and add a touch of discovery to every interaction.
about.description2: From the sleek design of our QuizPop buttons to the thoughtfully crafted quiz webapp, everything we create is rooted in our passion for unique experiences that entertain and inspire. Whether it's a casual game night or a lively family gathering, QuizPop turns moments into memories.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Interactive Fun Meets Memorable Learning
howItWorks.description: Transform your quiz nights with QuizPop's intuitive design. Featuring five vibrant buttons and a sleek mastercontrol, QuizPop creates a seamless way to play, learn, and laugh together. Perfect for family nights, team building, classrooms, or parties, QuizPop brings people closer while creating unforgettable moments.

features.gameplayDesc: Feel the excitement as players buzz in with their answers using QuizPop's physical buttons.
features.controlDesc: The QuizMaster takes charge effortlessly with the remote-style mastercontrol.
features.groupsDesc: Designed for 2 to 6+ players, from casual fun to competitive quizzes.
features.learningDesc: Use with the QuizPop web app to access a treasure trove of categories, questions, and facts.

setup.title: How It Works
setup.subtitle: Setting up QuizPop is as simple as it is fun:

steps.step1: Gather your team: Each player gets one of the five buttons.
steps.step2: QuizMaster in control: Use the mastercontrol to manage the game and reveal answers on the big screen.
steps.step3: Buzz in to answer: The first to press their button gets to answer.
steps.step4: Have fun and learn: Whether answers are right or wrong, each question comes with exciting facts and context.

classic.title: Classic Mode
classic.description: Perfect for casual quiz play, this mode lets everyone answer multiple-choice questions, enjoy fun facts, and learn new things after each answer.

quizMaster.title: QuizMaster Mode
quizMaster.description: The ultimate experience! The QuizMaster uses the mastercontrol to manage gameplay, while players buzz in to answer. After revealing the correct answer, the QuizMaster lights up the winning player's button with greenâ€”or gives a red light to signal wrong answers.
